aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access based on the tags that are passed in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access based on the tags associated with the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access based on the tag keys that are passed in the request

iam:awsservicename.description: Filters access by the AWS service to which this role is attached

iam:associatedresourcearn.description: Filters access by the resource that the role will be used on behalf of

iam:fido-fips-140-2-certification.description: Filters access by the MFA device FIPS-140-2 validation certification level at the time of registration of a FIDO security key

iam:fido-fips-140-3-certification.description: Filters access by the MFA device FIPS-140-3 validation certification level at the time of registration of a FIDO security key

iam:fido-certification.description: Filters access by the MFA device FIDO certification level at the time of registration of a FIDO security key

iam:organizationspolicyid.description: Filters access by the ID of an AWS Organizations policy

iam:passedtoservice.description: Filters access by the AWS service to which this role is passed

iam:permissionsboundary.description: Filters access if the specified policy is set as the permissions boundary on the IAM entity (user or role)

iam:policyarn.description: Filters access by the ARN of an IAM policy

iam:registersecuritykey.description: Filters access by the current state of MFA device enablement

iam:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to an IAM entity (user or role)
